title: Chris Hayes | Trump Suggests Putting Chinese Flags on U.S. Fighter Jets to Bomb Russia: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump musing about bombing Russia as Republicans blame Russia’s invasion of Ukraine on President Biden.

Then, Chris Hayes talks about celebrating the ninth anniversary of his show, how Russia’s invasion of Ukraine is negatively impacting the rest of the world and Trump’s political future.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
